name: Grand Theft Auto III Toughened
storyline:
It is a great alternative to the old "GTA3 Hardened" mod by ms.cooldude.
In the course of passing, the game will slip you all sorts of tricks and unexpected turns of events.
If you know an "easy" way to complete a particular mission, then it is most likely no longer relevant here.
Another author's radio station is added (does not replace another) where the author acts as a DJ and sings (to put it mildly) all sorts of songs. In general, the trash is still the same, but quite funny.
summary: Hard mod for the original GTA III.
